name: We are stronger together
description:
Try yourself in real battle for freedom! You should rescue your friends and help innocent people trapped by demons army to escape. (recommended to play in full screen mode) Controls: "A" & "D" to move "Space" to jump Left mouse button - attack "Tab" to pause the game (1 - 2 - 3) - Switch between Heroes You should rescue them first

Important note: Rogue can double jump
